wiki.content: The Titanium Songfacts explains that Sia recorded a demo guide vocal, which she sent first of all to Katy Perry, but the California Gurls singer turned it down saying she didn't want to work with Guetta. After trying several other artists, Mary J. Blige finally recorded the song, but her version leaked online in July 2011, so Guetta decided to stick with Sia's original version. 'Titanium' is the No.1 smash from French superstar-DJ-producer David Guetta and is a collaboration with Australian born singer-songwriter Sia Furler who co-wrote the song with David, Giorgio Tuinfort and Afrojack. Featuring Sia's distinctive sultry vocals, it became yet another hit single from the best-selling album 'Nothing but the Beat' in February 2012.
